comment: Actually Julia today is my day to mock you, enjoy your suffering and let you know that the worst is yet to come. Similar to yesterday and tomorrow.
amr:
# ::snt Actually Julia today is my day to mock you, enjoy your suffering and let you know that the worst is yet to come. Similar to yesterday and tomorrow.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / day
            :domain (t / today)
            :poss (ii / i)
            :purpose (a / and
                  :op1 (m2 / mock-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Julia")))
                  :op2 (e / enjoy-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (s / suffer-01
                              :ARG0 p))
                  :op3 (l / let-know-07
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 (b / bad-07
                              :time (y / yet)
                              :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG1 s
                                    :ARG3 (m3 / most)))))
            :ARG1-of (a2 / actual-02))
      :snt2 (r / resemble-01
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (y2 / yesterday)
                  :op2 (t2 / tomorrow))))
